participant_1.name: Aarav
participant_1.personality: A free-spirited and adventurous individual who enjoys pushing boundaries and exploring new experiences.
participant_1.background: my family and i are from india. i am a swim coach at my local pool. my favorite music genre is death metal. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited.

participant_2.name: Kiran
participant_2.personality: A resilient and imaginative teenager who often dreams big despite his challenges.
participant_2.background: i had to have a transplant. i'm a boy. i was born with my heart outside my body. i can move objects with my mind.
